author: macfarla
content: EIP status of "stagnant" - what does that mean? Specifically https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1898.md - Geth and Besu have at least partially implemented this - but it's not in the RPC spec - should these changes be rolled back so that clients match the spec?

author: lightclient
content: i means the author fell off somewhere on the path to finalization and the eip hasn't seen a change ~6+ months

author: lightclient
content: I recommend making a PR to `execution-apis` if 1898 isn't account for there!
